scripts.build: npm run build:headless && npm run build:ui
scripts.publish:local: npm run build && npm publish -w @cappasoft/openrouter-models --access public && npm publish -w @cappasoft/openrouter-model-selector --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run publish:local
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run publish:local
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run publish:local
